rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 06PGZA, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 56, 76, 78}
Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 06PGZA, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 56, 76, 78}
Unit was previously coded {CNS6301%, NUR4703%, NUR5703%}
Unit was previously coded {CNS6301%, NUR4703%, NUR5703%}

description: This unit is designed to prepare the post-registration nurse for advanced nursing practice by focussing on the pathophysiology of major body systems, patient assessment and alterations.The unit will also cover core concepts in care of the deteriorating patient equipping students with knowledge in areas of respiratory assessment and blood gas analysis, shock management and ECG interpretation.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
